alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 12:19PM CDT until June 14 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... South central Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Northwestern Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1219 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Toledo, or near Rison, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Star City... Rison... Gould... Grady... Nebo... Feenyville... Whitefield... Kedron... Woodville... Toledo... Linwood... Cane Creek State Park... Tarry... Tamo... Palmyra... Moscow... Crigler... Glendale in Lincoln County... Faith... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
